```{r}
remove.commas <- function(X){
  as.numeric(gsub(",", "", X))
}

get.states <- function(filename, year){
  df <- read.csv(filename, skip=22)
  df <- df[(3:(dim(df)[1]-24)),]

  df.2 <- apply(X = df[,-1], MARGIN = 2, FUN = remove.commas)
  df <- data.frame("State" = df[,1], df.2)
  return(df)
}
```
